snippet: The exchange, which has prided itself on being affordable, is facing requests for increases as high as 28 percent next year for some customers.
abstract: New York State residents are receiving notices from insurance companies saying they have asked for significant rate increases through state's health exchange for 2015; exchange, which has prided itself on being affordable, is facing increase requests as high as 28 percent for some customers of MetroPlus, one of least costly, and most popular, plans on exchange.
lead_paragraph: The exchange, which has prided itself on being affordable, is facing requests for increases as high as 28 percent next year for some customers.

headline.main: Insurers on New York State’s Health Exchange Seek Significant Rate Increases
headline.print_headline: Plans in Health Exchange FaceRate Increases in 2015

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
